page.title: 09Reading Radio /Television
page.content: There is no delivery of National daily newspapers or of the two local weekly papers which are ordered and personally collected from the village shop. There is aweekly delivery of a free advertiser containing some local news items. Magazines, including those for women and children and hobby enthusiasts, for example The Bell Ringer are also available at the shop along with maps and few paperback books. All families in the area own at least one radio, most have television and many have videos. Local as well as national programmes are available.
